summary: The 'Small Business Artificial Intelligence Advancement Act' directs the Director of the National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST) to develop and disseminate resources to help small businesses understand, adopt, and integrate artificial intelligence. These resources, including technical standards, best practices, and case studies, must be generally applicable, technology-neutral, and aligned with international standards. The bill also mandates a review and update of the resources, in coordination with the Small Business Administration, and requires a report to Congress on their effectiveness.
